p.k: Art, Classic Mexico (1952). Hrají: Pedro Armendariz, Katy Jurado, Andres Soler, Rosita Arenas. Režie: Luis Bunuel.
p.d: A tough, tall and strong young man helps to an evil old man to kick out a poor people from their houses, but he'll fall in love of a girl who lives with her father in the building about to be demolish.
